channel.description: Recent content in command-line on Khanh Nghiem

item.title: Script to add a page-level variable to content front matter in hugo
item.description: This was originally a question posed on the hugo discussion forums. The user wanted to loop through all her content files and add a weight page-level variable to the front matter.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content.
